basic.description: This course examines the roles and responsibilities of executive merchandising managers in retail culture; critical competitive challenges in the global, quality, social, and technological environment of various retail settings. This course is part of the intern block for merchandising majors.
basic.subject: CTE
basic.title: Executive Merchandising Management

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: A 2.50 GPA as well as a grade of "C" or better in CTE 3806, CTE 3835, CTE 4822, and MAR 2023.
